rows.label: qst701902_msg0001
rows.name:
Lieutenant Veronica, there's something
I'd like to discuss with you.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0002
rows.name: What is it, Adel-sama?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0003
rows.name:
We need a panacea from Invidia
called Dragon Incense.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0004
rows.name:
It's for a sick girl in
the capital. Do you think
it's possible to get it?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0005
rows.name: It is possible.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0006
rows.name:
However, returning to Invidia is
dangerous right now, so I'd want
to go with a small, elite squad.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0007
rows.name: That makes sense...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0008
rows.name: Do you have anyone suitable in mind?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0009
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0010
rows.name:
The Ryuuryuu squad is
ready for duty, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0011
rows.name: Are you sure about this?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0012
rows.name:
Don't think we are the same
Ryuuryuu squad from before, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0013
rows.name:
We were trained by Lieutenant
Veronica and have been reborn, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0014
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]You're all still soft! The four
of you together just about make
one competent soldier!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0015
rows.name: Mo mo mo?!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0016
rows.name: She doesn't rate us at all, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0017
rows.name: I have my doubts...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0018
rows.name: I'll go with them.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0019
rows.name:
Leaving this lot unsupervised
would just be asking for trouble.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0020
rows.name:
Augusto's knowledge of Invidia
will make him a perfect fit.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0021
rows.name:
But that's still effectively
a two-man team.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0022
rows.name:
The Dragon Incense is in the
Dragon's Stomach. You'll need
skilled fighters to get there.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0023
rows.name: If only we had some skilled hands...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0024
rows.name: We'll go too!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0025
rows.name:
Rita-san! Kaede-san! And
Dio-san is with you too.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0026
rows.name:
We heard the story from Marena-san.
We want to help Freja-chan too!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0027
rows.name:
Rita is a Driver, more or
less, so I should be able
to add some firepower.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0028
rows.name: Ugh... "More or less"...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0029
rows.name:
Zain-san asked me to come along
and look after these two.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0030
rows.name:
If Dio is with them, I'm
sure they'll be fine.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0031
rows.name: And I am here as well!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0032
rows.name:
Um... Leo-san, are you
a strong fighter?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0033
rows.name:
Hah! You underestimate me.
I'm famous for having more
guts than anyone else!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0034
rows.name:
And you'll need my song to inspire
everyone when they're about to
lose heart, will you not...?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0035
rows.name: That sounds rather irritating...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0036
rows.name: And yet... I'm moved...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0037
rows.name:
That so many people we've met
would offer to help us...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0038
rows.name: ...It makes me happy.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0039
rows.name: Me too.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0040
rows.name:
Adel-sama... these five,
effectively, should be able to
bring back the Dragon Incense.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0041
rows.name: You're right...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0042
rows.name: Wait a moment, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0043
rows.name: Chairman Morumo!?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0044
rows.name: Morumo will go too, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0045
rows.name: Why...?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0046
rows.name: Morumo loves the capital, mo.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0047
rows.name:
And Morumo loves the people
who live there, mo.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0048
rows.name: But I betrayed them...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0049
rows.name:
I want to atone for my sin,
mo! I'm prepared to be monster
bait or a decoy, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0050
rows.name: That's quite the resolve...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0051
rows.name:
With these six, I think
they'll be alright.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0052
rows.name:
Yes... But I want everyone to
come back. No sacrifices.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0053
rows.name:
Adel-sama... perhaps you
should appoint a leader?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0054
rows.name:
You're right. We know them all, but
some of them have only just met.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0055
rows.name:
A leader is necessary to ensure
the mission goes smoothly.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0056
rows.name: Laura, who should it be?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0057
rows.name: I get to decide?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0058
rows.name:
You're the one who built
these connections.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0059
rows.name:
You know them best, so I think
you should be the one to decide.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0060
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Hmm... Who should I entrust
the leader role to...?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0061
rows.name: Who will you choose as leader?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0101
rows.name: Dio

rows.label: qst701902_msg0102
rows.name: Rita

rows.label: qst701902_msg0103
rows.name: Ryuuryuu

rows.label: qst701902_msg0104
rows.name: Augusto

rows.label: qst701902_msg0105
rows.name: Leo

rows.label: qst701902_msg0106
rows.name: Morumo

rows.label: qst701902_msg0107
rows.name: Choose another candidate

rows.label: qst701902_msg0201
rows.name: Dio, will you be the leader?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0202
rows.name:
Yeah, leave it to me. I'll make sure
we bring back the Dragon Incense.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0211
rows.name: Rita, I'm counting on you to lead.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0212
rows.name: Huh, me?!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0213
rows.name:
I don't know if I can... But with
Kaede-chan here, I'll do my best!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0221
rows.name: Ryuuryuu, I'm entrusting you as leader.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0222
rows.name: Yes, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0223
rows.name:
Ryuuryuu has finally been
promoted to commanding eight
subordinates, mo...!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0231
rows.name: Augusto, I'm asking you to be leader.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0232
rows.name: Me?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0233
rows.name:
Well, I know Invidia well.
I'll bring it back for sure.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0241
rows.name: Leo, will you be the leader?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0242
rows.name: Of course, my dear friend!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0243
rows.name:
I'll also use the chance
to go break things off with
Juditta in Fons Maim.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0251
rows.name: Chairman Morumo, I'd like you to lead.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0252
rows.name:
Leave it to me, mo! I'm the
Chamber of Commerce chairman,
so it'll be a cinch, mo!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0253
rows.name:
I will assess everyone's
skills and assign tasks and
orders accordingly, mo.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0301
rows.name:
The leader is decided, but
I want you all to work
together and do your best.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0302
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0303
rows.name:
As they say, strike while the
iron's hot. Let's get going!

rows.label: qst701902_msg0304
rows.name:
...But who can pilot the
Divine Beast ship, mo?

rows.label: qst701902_msg0305
rows.name: I can't.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0306
rows.name:
If no one else can, I
could give it a try.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0307
rows.name: Please don't. I'd rather not sink.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0308
rows.name: ...Looks like we need a skilled pilot.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0309
rows.name: A skilled pilot, you say...

rows.label: qst701902_msg0310
rows.name: It would have to be Maquia.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0311
rows.name: I'm sure she's at Yajika Harbor.

rows.label: qst701902_msg0312
rows.name: Let's go and see!
